question.body: The Golden Retriever Club of America conducted a study of 64 golden retrievers, and found the average age at death in the sample to be 11.0 years old. Please report your intervals in parenthesis notation, and please round your final values to the nearest tenth for simplicity. Be sure to notice the size of the intervals with the different confidence levels.
